title: The Defeated Dragon - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mystery   Xuanhuan
tags: Aristocracy   Beast Companions   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Determined Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Dragons   Farming   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Knights   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Management   Pets   Romantic Subplot   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: 白雨涵
description: Liszt finds himself reborn as a countryside baron in an alternate world resembling medieval Europe. In this world, there are dragons that can discharge metals, elves that can tend to crops, and missions written in mist that only Liszt can see. With the help of the mysterious missions, can Liszt gradually grow from Baron of Flower Town into something greater, claiming the whole continent and beyond?>
